allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

applicationCategory.description: Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.

applicationSubCategory.description: Subcategory of the application, e.g. 'Arcade Game'.

applicationSuite.description: The name of the application suite to which the application belongs (e.g. Excel belongs to Office).

availableOnDevice.description: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

countriesNotSupported.description: Countries for which the application is not supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

countriesSupported.description: Countries for which the application is supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

device.description: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.

downloadUrl.description: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary.

featureList.description: Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).

fileSize.description: Size of the application / package (e.g. 18MB). In the absence of a unit (MB, KB etc.), KB will be assumed.

installUrl.description: URL at which the app may be installed, if different from the URL of the item.

permissions.description: Permission(s) required to run the app (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).

processorRequirements.description: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).

releaseNotes.description: Description of what changed in this version.

requirements.description: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).

screenshot.description: A link to a screenshot image of the app.

softwareAddOn.description: Additional content for a software application.

softwareRequirements.description: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
